def_cn: 诱饵;诱惑物;用作诱饵的人
def_en: If you refer to something or someone as a decoy, you mean that they are intended to attract people's attention and deceive them, for example by leading them into a trap or away from a particular place.
A decoy is a model of a bird that is used to attract wild birds towards it so that people can study them or shoot them.
